en.title: How to Switch Your Cat's Food | A Safe Method to Prevent Diarrhea
en.content:
When changing your cat's food, switching suddenly can cause indigestion or diarrhea. Transition gradually over 7 to 10 days.

A Safe 7-Day Transition Plan

DayOld FoodNew Food
Days 1-275%25%
Days 3-450%50%
Days 5-625%75%
Day 7 onward0%100%

Things to Watch During the Transition

Check the stool condition daily. If soft stool persists, go back one step and wait before advancing again. If there are frequent leftovers, reduce the new food ratio slightly and proceed more slowly.

Food Right After Adoption

A new environment itself is stressful, so it is best to continue with the same food the kitten was eating at the breeder's. Fuluck Cattery provides food information at the time of adoption.

zh.title: 猫咪换粮方法 | 防止腹泻的安全做法
zh.content:
给猫咪换粮时，突然更换会导致消化不良或腹泻。请用7至10天的时间逐步过渡。

安全的7天换粮计划

天数旧粮新粮
第1-2天75%25%
第3-4天50%50%
第5-6天25%75%
第7天起0%100%

换粮期间的注意事项

每天检查粪便状况。如果持续软便，请回退到上一步骤，观察后再继续推进。如果剩食较多，可以适当减少新粮比例，放慢过渡速度。

领养后的食物

新环境本身就会带来压力，因此领养后最好继续喂食繁殖者处一直在吃的食物。福楽猫舍在交接时会告知您食物的相关信息。
